Articles.Content:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=5]Presenting...
[U][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=7]The Lunar Landing Research Vehicle[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U]
[/SIZE][/B]The Lunar Landing Research Vehicle(LLRV) was used before the lunar landings to train astronauts with a LEM-type flying system. This craft failed Ã‚Â¾ times and nearly killed Neil Armstrong. The craft features an ejection seat. DO NOT USE ACTION GROUP.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8GWWaXn.jpg[/IMG]
[SIZE=4][FONT=courier new]Startup /Flying Procedures:
1. EVA Kerbal from lander can.
2. Place in External Command Seat
3. Ditch the lander can
4. Activate engine. Go very easy on the throttle.
5. Fly! RCS highly recomended.

[SIZE=1]*Warranty voided if used outside of Kerbin, used for spying on neighbors, spying on mission control, or used without proper license.
*Terms and conditions may apply[/SIZE]
[/FONT]
[/SIZE]

[U]
[SIZE=3][B][COLOR=#ff0000]Craft File
